content: houston there are no problems here get ready to blast off with the newest addition to my little people line of amigurumi crochet patterns this super simple pattern is perfect for using up those tiny balls of left over yarn in your stash all you ll need to make the little astronaut for your little explorer is a big ball of white yarn and very small scraps of red blue and gray this little astronaut will measure about 7 inches from head to foot using a size g hook and super saver yarn
